segments.text: Try it on in front of the mirror .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think the color is a little too bright .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have darker ones . Do you like the style ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What's this made of and how to wash it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: lt's made of silk and you had better wash it by hand in cold water .
segments.speaker: S1
